IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. MEMCACHED-PRODUCT-LOOKUP.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-PRODUCT-ID PIC 9(6).
       01 WS-PRODUCT-NAME PIC X(100).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           ACCEPT WS-PRODUCT-ID FROM CLIENT-REQUEST.
           CALL 'MEMCACHED-FETCH' USING WS-PRODUCT-ID
               RETURNING WS-PRODUCT-NAME.
           DISPLAY 'Product: ' WS-PRODUCT-NAME.
           STOP RUN.

       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-QUERY-HASH PIC X(32).
       01 WS-RESULT-SET PIC X(2000).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           ACCEPT WS-QUERY-HASH.
           CALL "MEMCACHED-APPEND" USING WS-QUERY-HASH
               WS-RESULT-SET "7200".
           DISPLAY "Query result cached".
           STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. DOWNLOAD-PRICE-LIST.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01  WS-DOWNLOAD-ENDPOINT PIC X(256).
       01  WS-DEST-FILE PIC X(256).
       01  WS-RESPONSE-CODE PIC 9(3).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE 'https://vendor.api.com/prices/export'
               TO WS-DOWNLOAD-ENDPOINT.
           MOVE '/data/prices_' TO WS-DEST-FILE.
           CALL 'FETCH-REMOTE-FILE' USING
               WS-DOWNLOAD-ENDPOINT WS-DEST-FILE
               RETURNING WS-RESPONSE-CODE.
           EVALUATE WS-RESPONSE-CODE
               WHEN 200
                   DISPLAY 'Download completed'
               WHEN OTHER
                   DISPLAY 'Download failed'
           END-EVALUATE.
           STOP RUN.

               ORGANIZATION IS SEQUENTIAL.

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. FTP-CONTROL-CHANNEL-LISTENER.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-CONTROL-MSG PIC X(200).
       01 WS-CHANNEL-ID PIC 9(4).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           PERFORM VARYING WS-CHANNEL-ID FROM 1 BY 1
               UNTIL WS-CHANNEL-ID > 100
               ACCEPT WS-CONTROL-MSG FROM CONSOLE
               CALL 'HANDLE-FTP-CONTROL-MSG'
                   USING WS-CONTROL-MSG WS-CHANNEL-ID
           END-PERFORM.
           STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
import org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient

fun deployApplicationBinaryToFtp(binaryPath: String, version: String) {
    val ftp = FTPClient()
    ftp.connect("releases.company.com", 21)
    ftp.login("deploy_user", "deploy_pass")
    val binaryData = java.io.File(binaryPath).readBytes()
    ftp.storeFile("/releases/app_v$version.bin", binaryData.inputStream())
    ftp.logout()
}

code_snippet:
<?php
namespace App\Http\Controllers;

class ArticleController {
    public function showArticle($slug) {
        $cache = apcu_cache_info();
        $key = 'article_' . md5($slug);
        $data = apcu_fetch($key);
        if (!$data) {
            $data = Article::findBySlug($slug);
            apcu_store($key, $data, 3600);
        }
        return view('article', ['data' => $data]);
    }
}

<?php
class ConfigCache {
    public function storeAppConfig($config) {
        $redis = new Redis();
        $redis->connect('redis-server', 6379);
        $redis->set('app:config', serialize($config));
        $redis->close();
    }
}
?>

code_snippet:
<?php
class CronJobHandler {
    public function executeDailyTask() {
        $database = $this->initializeDatabase();
        $rows = $database->query('SELECT id FROM pending_tasks');
        foreach ($rows as $row) {
            $database->exec('UPDATE pending_tasks SET status = "completed" WHERE id = ' . $row['id']);
        }
    }
    private function initializeDatabase() {
        return new PDO('mysql:unix_socket=/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock;dbname=tasks');
    }
}

class EmailEventListener {
    public function onEmailReceived($event) {
        $emailContent = $event->getPayload();
        $recipient = $emailContent['to'];
        mail($recipient, 'Event Notification', 'Your email was processed');
        echo "Email handler executed";
    }
}

$listener->onEmailReceived(new stdClass());

code_snippet:
<?php
function sendBulkEmails($recipientList, $templateName, $variables) {
    foreach ($recipientList as $recipient) {
        $to = $recipient['email'];
        $subject = 'Important Update';
        $body = renderTemplate($templateName, $variables);
        $headers = "MIME-Version: 1.0" . "\r\n";
        $headers .= "Content-type: text/html; charset=UTF-8" . "\r\n";
        mail($to, $subject, $body, $headers);
    }
}

<?php
class DocumentServer {
    public function handleRequest(ServerRequestInterface $request): ResponseInterface {
        if ($request->getMethod() === 'GET' && strpos($request->getUri()->getPath(), '/download') === 0) {
            $docId = $request->getQueryParams()['id'];
            $file = $this->docStore->getFile($docId);
            return new FileResponse($file);
        }
    }
}

<?php
$router->put('/api/files/sync', function() {
    $input = file_get_contents('php://input');
    $config = json_decode($input, true);
    $ftpResource = ftp_connect($config['endpoint'], $config['port'], 30);
    if (!ftp_login($ftpResource, $config['username'], $config['password'])) {
        http_response_code(403);
        exit('Authentication failed');
    }
    return ftp_pwd($ftpResource);
});

<?php
namespace App\Services;

class EmailNotificationService {
    public function scheduleWeeklyDigest() {
        cron_schedule('weekly_digest', '0 9 * * 1', function() {
            $users = $this->getUserList();
            foreach ($users as $user) {
                mail($user['email'], 'Weekly Digest', $this->generateContent());
            }
        });
    }
}

namespace Server\Protocol;

class TCPMessageServer {
    private $tcp_socket;
    
    public function __construct() {
        $this->tcp_socket = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, getprotobyname('tcp'));
        socket_bind($this->tcp_socket, 'localhost', 9000);
        socket_listen($this->tcp_socket);
    }
    
    public function acceptClient() {
        return socket_accept($this->tcp_socket);
    }
}
?>

<?php
class NotificationStream {
    public function establishSSEConnection() {
        header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
        header('Connection: keep-alive');
        header('X-Accel-Buffering: no');
        
        session_start();
        $userId = $_SESSION['user_id'];
        
        $notificationService = new NotificationService();
        foreach ($notificationService->getStreamFor($userId) as $notification) {
            echo "id: " . $notification['id'] . "\n";
            echo "data: " . json_encode($notification['payload']) . "\n\n";
            flush();
        }
    }
}
?>

code_snippet:
<?php
header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
header('Transfer-Encoding: chunked');
$curl = curl_init('https://external-api.service/events?stream=true');
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, false);
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_BINARYTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, function($curl, $data) {
    echo "data: " . base64_encode($data) . "\n\n";
    flush();
    return strlen($data);
});
curl_exec($curl);
curl_close($curl);
?>

code_snippet:
import asyncio
from grpc.aio import server
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
import service_pb2_grpc

engine = create_engine('mariadb+pymysql://user:pass@db.service/app')

class DataServicer(service_pb2_grpc.DataServiceServicer):
    async def RecordEvent(self, request, context):
        conn = engine.connect()
        conn.execute('INSERT INTO events (event_type, payload) VALUES (?, ?)',
                    (request.type, request.data))
        return service_pb2.Response(success=True)

async def serve():
    s = server()
    service_pb2_grpc.add_DataServiceServicer_to_server(DataServicer(), s)
    await s.start()

code_snippet:
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session

def update_user_profile(user_id, profile_data):
    engine = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://user:pass@localhost/user_db')
    with Session(engine) as session:
        user = session.query(User).filter(User.id == user_id).first()
        for key, value in profile_data.items():
            setattr(user, key, value)
        session.commit()

code_snippet:
def notify_admin_via_email(admin_email, event_type, event_details):
    import smtplib
    from email.mime.text import MIMEText
    subject = f'Admin Alert: {event_type}'
    body = f'Event Details:\n{event_details}'
    msg = MIMEText(body)
    msg['Subject'] = subject
    msg['From'] = 'alerts@platform.com'
    msg['To'] = admin_email
    server = smtplib.SMTP('smtp.platform.com', 587)
    server.starttls()
    server.sendmail('alerts@platform.com', admin_email, msg.as_string())
    server.quit()

from ftplib import FTP_TLS

def secure_upload_credentials():
    ftps = FTP_TLS('secure.ftp.company.com')
    ftps.login('secure_user', 'secure_pass')
    ftps.prot_p()
    with open('credentials.enc', 'rb') as cred_file:
        ftps.storbinary('STOR creds.enc', cred_file)
    ftps.quit()

import graphene
from elasticsearch import Elasticsearch

class Mutation(graphene.ObjectType):
    index_document = graphene.String(doc_id=graphene.String(), content=graphene.String())
    
    def resolve_index_document(root, info, doc_id, content):
        es = Elasticsearch(['http://localhost:9200'])
        es.index(index='documents', id=doc_id, body={'content': content})
        return 'Indexed'

class OrderProcessor(order_pb2_grpc.OrderServiceServicer):

code_snippet:
import grpc
from search_pb2 import QueryRequest
from search_pb2_grpc import SearchServiceStub

def search_documents(query_text, limit=10):
    channel = grpc.secure_channel('search-index:443', grpc.ssl_channel_credentials())
    stub = SearchServiceStub(channel)
    search_query = QueryRequest(text=query_text, max_results=limit)
    results = stub.Search(search_query)
    channel.close()
    return results

class ReportController < ApplicationController
  def generate
    report_id = params[:report_id]
    cached_report = Rails.cache.read("report:#{report_id}")
    if cached_report.nil?
      @report = generate_report_data(report_id)
      Rails.cache.write("report:#{report_id}", @report, expires_in: 24.hours)
    else
      @report = cached_report
    end
    render json: @report
  end
end

code_snippet:
def transferFileViaSftp(sourceFile: String, destPath: String): Unit = {
  val jsch = new JSch()
  val session = jsch.getSession("sftp_user", "sftp.remote.org", 22)
  session.setPassword("password123")
  session.setConfig("StrictHostKeyChecking", "no")
  session.connect()
  val channel = session.openChannel("sftp").asInstanceOf[ChannelSftp]
  channel.connect()
  channel.put(sourceFile, destPath)
  channel.disconnect()
  session.disconnect()
}
